sentence.Network_en: Politics used to be the perquisite of the property-owning classes.
sentence.Network_cn: 政治曾经是有产阶级的特权。

sentence.Network_en: Politics in Britain used to be the perquisite of the property - owning classes .
sentence.Network_cn: 英国的政治以往是 有产阶级 的特权.

sentence.Network_en: Politics was the perquisite of the upper class ( Richard B. Sewall )
sentence.Network_cn: 参政是上层阶级的特权 ( 理查德B. 休厄尔 )

list.abs: perquisite是什么意思|perquisite的中文意思... ... perquisite consumption ： 在职消费 perquisite prequisite ： 临时津贴.
perquisites include the use of the company car .福利包括可以使用公司的汽车。
she gets various perquisites in addition to her wages .她工资以外，还有各种津贴。
new diesel locomotive perquisite provide automatic control system research ., 新型内燃机车油水发放自动控制系统的研究.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from medieval Latin perquisitum 'acquisition', from Latin perquirere 'search diligently for', from per- 'thoroughly' + quaerere 'seek'

entry.def: A perquisite is the same as a perk .

example.ex: ...cost-free long-distance calls, a perquisite of her employment.
example.tran: 免费长途电话，她享受的一种工作补贴

means.word_mean: 1. an incidental benefit awarded for certain types of employment (especially if it is regarded as a right);

sentences.sentence: "a limousine is one of the fringe benefits of the job"

means.word_mean: 2. a right reserved exclusively by a particular person or group (especially a hereditary or official right);

sentences.sentence: "suffrage was the prerogative of white adult males"

means.word_mean: (工资以外的)财务补贴,额外收入,津贴,奖金,小费

sentences.en: They are rewarded in pay,power and perquisites.
sentences.cn: 作为报偿,他们得到了钱、权力和额外收益。

sentences.en: She gets various perquisites in addition to her wages.
sentences.cn: 她工资以外,还有各种津贴。
